title: Highest power generation, transmission of 24,284 MW successfully achieved: Shahbaz Gill
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 07 (APP): Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Political Communication, Dr. Shahbaz Gill on Wednesday said that the highest power generation and transmission of 24,284 MW in the history of Pakistan was successfully achieved today.
In a tweet, he said, the highest record in a single day in 2018 was 20,811 MW.
آج پاکستان کی تاریخ کی سب سے زیادہ بجلی کی پیداوار اور ترسیل 24,284 MW کامیابی کے ساتھ حاصل کی گئی۔اس پہلے 2018 میں کسی ایک دن میں یہ ریکارڈ 20811 MW تھا۔اگر موجودہ حکومت ترسیل کے نظام کو بہتر نہ کرتی تو ہم یہ حاصل نہ کر پاتے۔حماد اظہر اورعمر ایوب خاص طور پر مبارکباد کے مستحق ہیں
— Dr. Shahbaz GiLL (@SHABAZGIL) July 7, 2021
If the present government had not improved the transmission system, we would not have been able to achieve this, Shahbaz Gill added.
Hamad Azhar and Omar Ayub deserve special congratulations, he said.
